name: Endless Bosses 1.2
description:
*05/2020 FIXED BUGS IN BALLS FROM BOSS 2 AND BOSS 3*

*11/2019 FIXED SOME BUGS FROM KAMIKAZES, BOSS 3 AND BOSS 7*

Endless Overpowered bosses to defeat in the space! There are 9 bosses randomly spawned over time!

Everything made by me ,except from the music and sound fx.

Music: Space traveler-8bitFanatic

FX: 8 bit kit

Have fun!

***********************************************************************

Instructions:

Buy upgrades to improve your ship.

+ Speed

+ Fire Rate

+ Damage

Move with arrow keys.

Shoot auto.

How it works:

*First 6 bosses come one by one in numerical order.

*After you've passed through that, there are a total of 9 bosses available, and they will be randomly fighting against you.

*You won't be able to buy HP when fighting against Boss 9

*If you die, consider KPs as your score...

*There are CODES! Try to find 'em.
